member.name: T:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon
member.summary: Specifies constants defining which symbol to display on a .

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.None
member.summary: The message box contain no symbols.
member.remarks: This is the default for unknown values.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Information
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i. This is styled italic and displayed in blue on very pale blue.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Asterisk
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i. This is styled italic and displayed in blue on very pale blue.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Question
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of a question mark. This is styled regular and displayed in green on very pale green.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Warning
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation mark. This is styled bold and displayed in black on yellow.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Exclamation
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation mark. This is styled bold and displayed in black on yellow.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Error
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an uppercase letter X. This is styled bold and displayed in white on red.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Hand
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an uppercase letter X. This is styled bold and displayed in white on red.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon.Stop
member.summary: The message box contains a symbol consisting of an uppercase letter X. This is styled bold and displayed in white on red.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons
member.summary: Specifies constants defining which buttons to display on a .

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.OK
member.summary: The message box contains an OK button.
member.remarks: This is the default for unknown values.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.OKCancel
member.summary: The message box contains OK and Cancel buttons.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.AbortRetryIgnore
member.summary: The message box contains Abort, Retry, and Ignore buttons.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel
member.summary: The message box contains Yes, No, and Cancel buttons.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.YesNo
member.summary: The message box contains Yes and No buttons.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons.RetryCancel
member.summary: The message box contains Retry and Cancel buttons.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBox
member.summary: Displays a message box from which the text can be copied.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBox.Show(System.String)
member.summary: Displays a message box with the specified text. The text can be copied.
member.param: The text to display in the message box. This text can be copied.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBox.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons,System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays a message box with the specified text, caption, buttons, icon and default button. The text can be copied.
member.param: The text to display in the message box. This text can be copied.
The text to display in the title bar of the message box.
One of the values that specifies which buttons to display in the message box. If not specified, is used.
One of the values that specifies which icon to display in the message box. If not specified, is used.
The zero-based index of the default button. If not specified, 0 is used.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the button pressed.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBox.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxButtons,System.Windows.Forms.CopyableMessageBoxIcon,System.Int32,System.Int32)

One of the values that specifies which buttons to display in the message box.
One of the values that specifies which icon to display in the message box.
The zero-based index of the default button.
The zero-based index of the cancel button.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the button pressed.

member.summary: Displays a message box containing the specified including a full traceback of inner exceptions. The text can be copied.
member.param: A to display.

member.summary: Displays a message box containing the specified including a full traceback of inner exceptions, with the specified caption. The text is display before the exception trace. The text can be copied.
